snippet: Governors from both U.S. political parties plan to talk to President Barack Obama on Monday about preventing potential cuts to National Guard units, several governors said on Sunday....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Governors Plan to Urge Obama Not to Downsize National Guard
headline.main: U.S. Governors Plan to Urge Obama Not to Downsize National Guard

lead_paragraph: Governors from both U.S. political parties plan to talk to President Barack Obama on Monday about preventing potential cuts to National Guard units, several governors said on Sunday.
